Introduction

Hyejin is a South Korean dancer, singer and rapper under SAI Entertainment.

Hyejin was part of the trainee group WishGirls. She made her first appearance with the group on March 5, 2019 while her name was officially revealed during a vlog, on April 1. She released a solo song, "Boyfriend", on October 10, 2019.

Hyejin made her debut as a member of the girl group CRAXY on March 2, 2020, with the full-length album "My Universe".

Fun facts

1
Hyejin met Apink, her role models, at Inkigayo(during Apink's DND promotions). Hyejin took her Panda Bong(Apink's Lightstick) with her, which was signed by Apink members personally. Hyejin also put the pictures she took with them as her wallpaper.
